    public abstract class CcddInformationTreeHandler
extends CcddCommonTreeHandler
    CFS Command and Data Dictionary generic information tree handler class
    See Also:

    • Constructor Detail

      • CcddInformationTreeHandler

        CcddInformationTreeHandler(CcddMain ccddMain,
                           CcddUndoHandler undoHandler,
                           CcddConstants.InternalTable infoType,
                           java.util.List<java.lang.String[]> infoDefinitions,
                           java.lang.String filterValue,
                           boolean filterFlag,
                           java.util.List<java.lang.String> treePathOrder,
                           java.awt.Component parent)
        Generic information tree handler class constructor
        Parameters:
        ccddMain - main class
        undoHandler - reference to the undo handler
        infoType - internal table type
        infoDefinitions - list of string arrays containing each node name and associated tool tip
        filterValue - string value that may be used to modify the tree building method; null or blank if not filtering
        filterFlag - flag used to filter the tree content
        treePathOrder - list containing all of the items that potentially can appear in the tree in the order in which they appear when added to the tree; null if no order is specified (the order can be specified later, if needed)
        parent - GUI component over which to center any error dialog

      • CcddInformationTreeHandler

        CcddInformationTreeHandler(CcddMain ccddMain,
                           CcddUndoHandler undoHandler,

                           java.lang.String filterValue,
                           boolean filterFlag,
                           java.util.List<java.lang.String> treePathOrder,
                           java.awt.Component parent)
        Generic information tree handler class constructor
        Parameters:
        ccddMain - main class
        undoHandler - reference to the undo handler
        infoType - internal table type
        filterValue - string value that may be used to modify the tree building method; null or blank if not filtering
        filterFlag - flag used to filter the tree content
        treePathOrder - list containing all of the items that potentially can appear in the tree in the order in which they appear when added to the tree; null if no order is specified (the order can be specified later, if needed)
        parent - GUI component over which to center any error dialog

        protected int getItemNodeLevel()

        Node level for tree nodes below the filter and header nodes

        private CcddClassesComponent.ToolTipTreeNode addNode(CcddClassesComponent.ToolTipTreeNode parentNode,
                                                     java.lang.String nodeName,
                                                     java.lang.String toolTipText,
                                                     CcddInformationTreeHandler.TreeChildOrder order)
        Add a node to the tree
        Parameters:
        parentNode - parent node for the new node
        nodeName - name of the node to add
        toolTipText - tool tip text for the new node
        order - order in which the added node should be placed relative to the child nodes already preset
        Returns:
        Reference to the newly added child node

                                                                  java.lang.String toolTipText,

        Add a new node to the tree's root node, or the application node is filtering by application is active
        Parameters:
        nodeName - name of the node to add
        toolTipText - tool tip text for the new node
        isApp - true if the group represents a CFS application
        Returns:
        Reference to the newly added node

      • addSourceNodesToTargetNode

        protected void addSourceNodesToTargetNode(java.util.List<java.lang.Object[]> sourcePaths,
                                          int startIndex,
                                          boolean onlyIfPrimitive)
        Add the specified nodes(s) from the source tree to the specified node(s) in the information tree
        Parameters:
        sourcePaths - list containing the node paths for the selected nodes in the source tree
        startIndex - tree level at which the desired node names first appear in the source tree
        onlyIfPrimitive - true to only include nodes that end with a reference to primitive data type; false to include all nodes

                                 java.lang.Object[] sourcePath,
                                 int startIndex)
        Add the specified table(s)/variable(s) to the specified information node(s)
        Parameters:
        node - parent information node for this variable
        sourcePath - array containing the source node path
        startIndex - tree level at which the variable names first appear in the array

        Reference to the renamed node; null if no node with the name oldName exists

      • copyNodeTree

        protected void copyNodeTree(java.lang.String originalName,
                            java.lang.String nameOfCopy,
                            java.lang.Object infoToCopy)
        Copy the tree of a source node to a target node
        Parameters:
        originalName - name of the node to copy
        nameOfCopy - name of the copy of the node
        infoToCopy - information object to copy

      • addInformation

        protected abstract void addInformation(java.lang.Object information,
                                       java.lang.String nameOfCopy)
        Placeholder for method to add a copy of the specified information object to the information list
        Parameters:
        information - information object to copy
        nameOfCopy - name of the copy of the node

      • copySubTree

        protected void copySubTree(CcddClassesComponent.ToolTipTreeNode source,
                           CcddClassesComponent.ToolTipTreeNode target)
        Recursively copy the tree of a source node to a target node
        Parameters:
        source - source node
        target - target node

      • createDefinitionsFromTree

        protected java.util.List<java.lang.String[]> createDefinitionsFromTree()
        Create the information definitions from the tree for storage in the database or to use as a comparison to a previously committed version of the tree.
        Returns:
        List containing the path array for each child node belonging to an information node

      • createDefinitionsFromInformation

        protected abstract java.util.List<java.lang.String[]> createDefinitionsFromInformation()
        Placeholder to initialize the definition list
        Returns:
        Initialized definition list

      • cleanNodePath

        protected java.lang.String[] cleanNodePath(java.lang.Object[] nodePath)
        Remove any unwanted text from the node names. The object array is converted to a string array
        Parameters:
        nodePath - path array
        Returns:
        Cleaned node path array

      • buildDefinitionFromTree

        private void buildDefinitionFromTree(CcddClassesComponent.ToolTipTreeNode node)
        Recursively step through the information tree and append the path to each leaf node to the definition list
        Parameters:
        node - node to check

      • addLeafDefinition

        protected void addLeafDefinition(java.util.List<java.lang.String[]> treeDefns,
                                 java.lang.String[] leafDefn,
                                 java.lang.String filterValue)
        Add the specified leaf definition to the tree definition list. Override this method to insert other information into the leaf definition prior to adding it to the tree definition list
        Parameters:
        treeDefns - list to which to add the leaf definition
        leafDefn - leaf definition to add to the list
        filterValue - string value that may be used to modify the tree; null or blank if not used

      • convertLeafNodePath

        protected java.lang.String convertLeafNodePath(java.lang.Object[] path)
        Convert the array describing the leaf node path into a single string, with the nodes separated by commas
        Parameters:
        path - array describing the tree path to construct
        Returns:
        Node names, separated by commas, in the specified path

      • convertLeafNodePath

        protected java.lang.String convertLeafNodePath(java.lang.Object[] path,
                                               int startAdjust)
        Convert the array describing the leaf node path into a single string, with the nodes separated by commas
        Parameters:
        path - array describing the tree path to construct
        startAdjust - starting node level adjustment
        Returns:
        Node names, separated by commas, in the specified path
